item.title: Call the Midwife - Series 14: Episode 1
item.description: The team support a pregnant teenage girl whose family believe in an immaculate conception.

item.title: The Traitors - Series 3: Episode 1
item.description: A group of strangers play the ultimate game of detection, back-stabbing and trust.

item.title: SAS Rogue Heroes - Series 2: Episode 1
item.description: Paddy leaves gaol to join the SAS for the invasion of Europe.

item.title: The Split - Barcelona: Episode 1
item.description: Hannah and the Defoes are reunited to attend the wedding of daughter Liv and fiance Gael.

item.title: 7/7: The London Bombings - Series 1: Episode 1
item.description: On 7 July 2005, four bombs explode. Is it a suicide attack? Will the bombers strike again?

item.title: The Traitors: Uncloaked - Traitors Series 3: Episode 1
item.description: Emma Willis, Babatunde Aleshe and Harry from Series 2 discuss Episode 1 of Series 3.

item.title: Lucy Worsley Investigates - Series 2: 1. Jack the Ripper
item.description: How did the Jack the Ripper case fuel today's true crime obsession?

item.title: The Mask
item.description: An ancient mask transforms put-upon nice guy Stanley Ipkiss into a twinkle-toed charmer.

item.title: Shrek the Third
item.description: Animated sequel. Shrek must find the heir to the throne or face becoming king himself.

item.title: Mrs Brown's Boys - 2024 Specials: 2. B&B Mammy
item.description: Agnes turns her spare room into a B&B. With a criminal on the loose, what could go wrong?

item.title: Gavin & Stacey - A Fond Farewell
item.description: A documentary special which tells the story of one of Britain’s best-loved sitcoms.

item.title: Gavin & Stacey - Gavin & Stacey: The Finale
item.description: Find out what happened after Nessa’s marriage proposal to Smithy.

item.title: Doctor Who - Joy to the World
item.description: The Doctor meets Joy in the Time Hotel, where a deadly plan threatens Christmas itself.

item.title: Walk the Line
item.description: The story of the legendary country artist Johnny Cash.

item.title: The Courier
item.description: Salesman Greville Wynne is recruited to infiltrate Cold War Moscow.

item.title: Black Panther
item.description: Prince T'Challa hopes to lead his people to a brighter future but faces many threats.

item.title: Wedding Crashers
item.description: Two chancers find their friendship is tested to the limit when one of them falls in love.

item.title: Casualty - 7: Public Property: 2. On Trial
item.description: Dylan and Jodie are bonded by a tragic death.

item.title: Cunk on Life
item.description: Cunk returns for a one-off special to examine life and existence. Starring Diane Morgan.

item.title: Have I Got Sport for You
item.description: A festive round-up of the year’s top sports stories hosted by Jason Manford.

item.title: Gladiators - Celebrity Special
item.description: Rob Beckett, Joel Dommett, Louise Minchin and Ellie Taylor take on the mighty Gladiators.

item.title: Lives Well Lived - 2024: Episode 1
item.description: Kirsty Wark looks back at the lives of some of the famous people who died in 2024.

item.title: Expedition Killer Whale
item.description: A team heads to Antarctica to study killer whales that create waves to wash seals off ice.

item.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby - Series 6: 8. Wilderness Hotel Inari
item.description: Rob and Monica travel to Lapland to work in freezing temperatures at a Sami-owned hotel.

item.title: Strike - The Ink Black Heart: Episode 1
item.description: A cartoon creator urges Robin to expose an anonymous online figure spreading hate.
During the First World War, two soldiers must cross no-man's-land to deliver a message.

item.title: The Monuments Men
item.description: A WWII US Army unit takes on the challenge of returning looted art to its rightful owners.

item.title: The Guernsey Literary and Potato Peel Pie Society
item.description: An author (Lily James) makes some life-changing friends at a farmer's literary society.

item.title: The Man Who Would Be King
item.description: Colourful epic in which two British soldiers become godlike rulers in colonial India.
